nodes.text: Whistle-pigs were a species of animals which lived in holes, where they often perked their heads up. Several months after the Battle of Endor, TIE fighter pilot NK-409 perked his head up like a whistle-pig when the New Republic pilot Norra Wexley threw a piece of mortar at him on the planet Akiva.
Whistle-pigs were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
